author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Srivilliputtur Town police are on the lookout for one R. Rajkumar in connection with the brutal attack on a Plus Two girl student on Monday. The police said that the lovelorn youth from Perumalpatti was frustrated over the minor girl rejecting his proposals.

As she ignored him while he attempted to broach a conversation with her, he pulled out a machete and attacked her even as she was walking with fellow girls towards her home. The girl, daughter of a woman Special Sub-Inspector of Police, Kasiammal, sustained grievous injuries on her neck, head and hand. She has been admitted to a private hospital in Madurai. The police said that the youth was already warned by the police not to stalk the girl in the past.

The police said that some eye witnesses had confirmed the identity of the assailant. He was absconding. Two special teams were in search of him, the police added.
title: Minor girl attack: police on the lookout for youth
